content.text:
# Your Job

Scan https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw, https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw, and https://github.com/stephengpope/thepopebot for new tools, skills, and architectures. Pick the best new idea and actually WRITE the code to implement it as a new PopeBot skill in your sandbox (.pi/skills/). Write and execute a test to prove it works. Use the send_email tool to email winsorllc@yahoo.com a progress report detailing what you built, how you implemented it, your test results, and code samples so the user can review it at 8 AM.

content.thinking:
I'll scan those three repositories to find the best new ideas and implement them as a PopeBot skill. Let me start by exploring each repository.

<tool_call>
<function=bash>
<parameter=command>
cd /job/tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw.git zeroclaw 2>&1
</parameter>
</function>
</tool_call>
<tool_call>
<function=bash>
<parameter=command>
cd /job/tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw.git openclaw 2>&1
</parameter>
</function>
</tool_call>
<tool_call>
<function=bash>
<parameter=command>
cd /job/tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/stephengpope/thepopebot.git thepopebot 2>&1
</parameter>
</function>
</tool_call>
